short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: (B.O.B.C.A.T.) Banish Object Before Content Assessment Translation. Remove NoTranslate tag on content assessments.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Remove NoTranslate tag on content assessments to allow native Google Chrome language translation to occur. 

Instructions: After the assessment is displayed, 1) perform the right-click Google translate, then 2) refresh the page, then 3) translate again. You should now have a translated content assessment.
